com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean

Interface AdministratorMBean


  • public interface AdministratorMBean
    Interface for administrative functions over an Esper engine instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compileEPL(java.lang.String eplExpression)
      Compile and EPL statement without starting the statement.

      Create an EPL statement.

      Create a pattern statement.
      void destroyStatement(java.lang.String statementName)
      Destroy a statement.
      ConfigurationInformation getConfigurationInformation()
      Returns the configuration information.
      java.lang.String getStatementDetailsXML()
      Returns the statement detail list as an XML document.
      java.lang.String[] getStatementNames()
      Returns the statement names of all statements that are in started or stopped state.
      java.lang.String getStatementState(java.lang.String statementName)
      Returns the current statement state of a statement.
      java.lang.String getURI()
      Returns the engine URI, or the literal default-provider for the default provider.

      Start a statement, or no action if the statement is already started.
      void stopStatement(java.lang.String statementName)
      Stop a statement, or no action if the statement is already stopped.

      • createPattern

        void createPattern(java.lang.String onExpression,
                 java.lang.String statementName)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a pattern statement.

        Compiles and starts the statement as does the method of the same name in the adminstrative interface.

        Parameters:
        onExpression - pattern expression, required
        statementName - statement name, required
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the statement could not be created
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • createEPL

        void createEPL(java.lang.String epl,
             java.lang.String statementName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Create an EPL statement.

        Compiles and starts the statement as does the method of the same name in the adminstrative interface.

        Parameters:
        epl - is the EPL expression, required
        statementName - statement name, required
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the statement could not be created
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • compileEPL

        void compileEPL(java.lang.String eplExpression)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Compile and EPL statement without starting the statement.

        Compiles and but does not start the statement as does the method of the same name in the adminstrative interface.

        Parameters:
        eplExpression - to compile
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the EPL statement could not be compiled
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • startStatement

        void startStatement(java.lang.String statementName)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Start a statement, or no action if the statement is already started.
        Parameters:
        statementName - of the statement to start
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the statement name could not be found
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • stopStatement

        void stopStatement(java.lang.String statementName)

        Stop a statement, or no action if the statement is already stopped.
        Parameters:
        statementName - of the statement to stop
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the statement name could not be found
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access
